content: **size ** one size fits most **finished measurements ** circumference 21 /53 cm height 8 75 /22 5 cm **gauge** 21 single_crochet + ch1 x 21 row stitch = 4 /10cm square **materials** urth yarns uneek worsted 100% sw extrafine merino 220 yds/100g per skein 1 skein #4020 hook us g/6 4 00mm for the body of the beanie or size needed to obtain gauge us e/4 3 50mm for the brim tapestry needle **pattern notes** the beanie is crocheted in pieces joined with slip stitch joins as you go the circular crown is worked in the round as 1 piece the body of the beanie is made from three different sizes and variations of motifs the motifs are worked separately joined together with slip_stitch joins as you go into larger blocks then all together and joined to the crown piece finally the brim is worked in the round with a smaller hook
